attributes.action: correct the injustice of imported 1st registered vehicle taxation higher than same vehicle classed as UK models
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There is an abnormality in the rule '1st registered'  it causes the owners of imported vehicles, manufactured before 2001, and imported after 2001 into the UK, to pay higher road taxation, as a manufactured vehicle before 2001, and registered in UK before 2001.  Same vehicle, that has the same emissions and conformity to construction and use, and European standards, but

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
